Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: In today's news people are feeling the pressure on their finances as calls for a boost to JobSeeker payments grow louder. Meanwhile a major rescue operation saved the lives of 11 stranded fishermen off Western Australia's coast. The Reserve Bank of New Zealand is stirring a heated debate and the Australian share market is closing lower after revealing that interest rate decision this month was a close call. As we await the Federal Budget all eyes are on the government's response to these pressing financial concerns.
